import React, { Component } from 'react'; class StudentForm extends Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state={ name:'', age:'', group:'', email:'', gender:'', adress:'' } } onChange = (e) => { const state = this.state state[e.target.name] = e.target.value; this.setState(state); console.log(state) } render(){ const{name,age,group,email,gender,adress} = this.state return(
New Student
) } } export default StudentForm
